Message.Text: The requested data is missing from the archive.

Hi, I am a chat bot Ukraine Exchange Rates. I can find out for you the exchange rate for a specific date. Available currencies: AUD, CAD, CZK, DKK, HUF, ILS, JPY, LVL, LTL, NOK, SKK, SEK, CHF, RUB, GBP, USD, BYR, EUR, GEL, PLZ.. Request format, for example: USD / 25.08.2021.
